welcome_message_body: Welcome to Manteca, where small-town charm meets big-city opportunity. Known for its beautiful parks, friendly locals, and delicious local cuisine, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stockton Metropolitan Airport houses all necessary facilities for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stockton Metropolitan Airport handles all cargo operations, including loading and unloading of freight from aircraft.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may experience slow speeds during peak travel times.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
